content:
je možné, že už je preplnený priečinok "Doručená pošta" a možno aj "Odoslaná pošta", kde je Thunderbirdom stanovený maximálny objem 4GB (rovnako ako aj pre každý samostatný priečinok). Kliknite na priečinok "Doručená pošta" pravým tlačidlom myši, vyberte "Vlastnosti" a preverte akú veľkosť na disku zaberá. Limit veľkosti zložky je detailnejšie vysvetlený tuná: http://kb.mozillazine.org/Limits_%28Thunderbird%29#Folders_and_messages.

Odporúčam staré správy z preplneného priečinka "Doručená pošta" a "Odoslaná pošta" odstrániť, alebo archivovať. Postup archivácie: Označte všetku starú poštu v priečinku "Doručená pošta" (cca 1000 emailov) a zvoľte a (stlačiť klávesu a), alebo ich po označení archivujte aj takto (druhá možnosť): - Thunderbird - Správa - Archivovať - všetka stará pošta je ARCHIVOVANÁ - nájdete ju v priečinku ARCHÍVY pod konkrétnym letopočtom. Poštu z roku 2025 archivuje do priečinka 2025. Poštu z roku 2024 archivuje do priečinka 2024...atď https://support.mozilla.org/cs/kb/archivace-zprav

Pokiaľ v Thunderbirde odstránite e-mail, tak sa v skutočnosti iba označí ako odstránený, ale fyzicky zostane. Jeho fyzické odstránenie sa vykoná až použitím voľby "Údržba priečinkov“. Takže aby ste zmenšili veľkosť preplneného priečinka je nutné ešte vykonať "Údržbu priečinkov": https://support.mozilla.org/cs/kb/provedeni-udrzby-slozek. POSTUP: - Thunderbird - Súbor - Vykonať údržbu priečinkov http://imgbank.cz/images/2015/08/19/Thunderbird_udrzba_priecinkov.jpg

Ďalšou možnosťou je, že ste narazili na limit veľkosti niektorého iného priečinka, kde je maximálny limit tak isto 4GB. V tomto prípade pomôže to isté - uvoľniť preplnený priečinok archiváciou, alebo odstránením starých správ, a následným spustením "Údržby priečinkov".
creator: Ansamb

content:
Často se stává, že index poštovní složky (.msf) je poškozený.

V Thunderbirdu klikněte pravým tlačítkem na složku (např. Doručená pošta). Zvolte Vlastnosti → Opravit složku (Repair Folder). Thunderbird přestaví index.
creator: Ansamb

content:
• uvoľniť preplnený priečinok archiváciou, alebo odstránením starých správ, a následným spustením "Údržby priečinkov".

V mém Thunderbirdu 144.0.1 je tam tlačítko "Aktualizovat". Přejmenování udělali záměrně kvůli konzistenci s IMAP syncem – ale „Aktualizovat“ stále dělá stejné, co dřív „Opravit složku“ (rebuild indexu).
creator: poljos-moz

content: This happens when the profile has been renamed or does not exist. You can fix this manually. Here is what happens: - When thunderbird starts, it tries to open a file named profiles.ini, located at c:\users\<yourid>\appdata\roaming\thunderbird. If that file is not present,you get the error. You also get the error if the profile it is pointing to does not exist (or has the wrong name).
creator: davidsk

content:
Probabilmente nella tua rubrica hai associato il nome di questo mittente all'indirizzo di un provider PEC. Dovrebbe bastare cancellare il mittente dalla rubrica:

La PEC nel sistema italiano è una particolare email con valore legale. Per ottenere questo risultato la comunicazione tra un mittente MITT ed un destinatario DEST è mediata dal una società abilitata alla gestione della PEC rispondente a precisi requisiti tecnici (GEST). Nelle intestazioni della PEC avremo quindi riferimenti a MITT, DEST e GEST. Supponiamo che DEST, ricevuta una PEC da MITT, voglia aggiungere il mittente alla propria rubrica di Thunderbird. A volte capita che al nome di MITT non vanga associato il relativo indirizzo email ma quello dell'intermediario GEST. Il risultato è che da quel momento in poi tutte le PEC ricevute da utenti di GEST appariranno con mittente MIT, talvolta con la dicitura "per conto di". Per risolvere il problema è necessario cancellare il contatto MITT dalla rubrica.

content: The answer is a "yes, but..." Yes, you can copy them, but they may not work. That is because filters are specific to accounts. However, it's possible to edit the filters. Each account has a file named msgfilterrules.dat, and it is a simple text file you can edit with Notepad. With thunderbird not running, you can open one a view it to see what changes might be needed to use on other accounts; they may be minor.

content: The addressbook on your PC? Or an addressbook you might have with an online account, such as Gmail? If someone has access to your PC's addressbook, that means they have access to your PC and are running software on your PC. Your bigger problem is in getting them off the PC. Check your antivirus and firewall settings, and possibly have an expert check the PC for malware.

content:
Da quell'errore non si esce, non puoi forzare l'autenticazione. Se sei certo che i dati di login e i parametri di configurazione siano corretti, ti suggerisco di sentire il supporto di Fastweb.

Più in generale comunque, Per poter inquadrare il problema prova a fornire queste informazioni:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)

content:
re :Is there a phone number I can call to talk to someone?

No. It's a free product. There are no offices with people sat next to phones. Also, you could be anywhere in world. I happen to be in the UK.

re: I cannot sign into thunderbird.

When Thunderbird starts up, it will attempt to access the server to check and download emails. If the server rejects the password, then you can typically see a pop up saying password wrong - reenter it. Thunderbird has nothing to do with the password itself. It uses the stored password to access the server to download emails.

There is no such thing as 'no matter what password I try'. There is only one password which works and that is created/modified in the webmail account. You can only use the password which the server has stated you must use.

First you need to confirm the password is correct and works and the only way to do that is to logon to your webmail account via a browser.

Please logon to your webmail account and confirm you can get access to the account to see emails.


What password is it asking for? Is it asking specifically for the 'Primary Password' ? If yes, then that is not a mail account password. A 'primary password' is something you set up as a separate security measure. It is typically used by people who share a computer and also allow others access to their computer User Account. That would mean they could see anything on their computer. However, as they would have access to Thunderbird and access to see your emails, you may not want them to see your saved passwords. So, the Primary Password is something set up to stop prying eyes seeing your stored passwords. When you start up Thunderbird, it usually asks for the 'primary password' once per session. It may also ask for 'primary password' when you choose to see your saved passwords.

Some servers now state you cannot use the normal password that you use to logon to webmail. Some say you have to use an 'app specific password' - I would need to know what server you are talking about so I can check whether it requires a 'secure password' / 'app specific password.

Some servers eg: Gmail - do not allow normal passwords because they use OAuth, so entering a normal password would fail because it expects an oauth password.

What server are you connecting to?

Post an image file showing this info: Account Settings > 'Server Settings' for the account.
